title: The Rise of AI-Powered Mobile Apps in Florida’s Tech Scene
description: Florida’s reputation has long been built on sunshine, tourism, and agriculture. title: A.I. Is Driving a Stock Market Rally in China, Too
description: Surging interest in artificial intelligence is generating huge gains for Chinese tech stocks like Alibaba, which has more than doubled this year.
content:

title: Virtual Jesus? People of faith divided as AI enters religion
description: Artificial intelligence is increasingly integrating into religious practices, offering virtual spiritual guidance and automated sermons, which elicits mixed reactions from believers. While apps like "Text with Jesus" gain users and some clergy see AI as an educational tool, concerns persist about the technology's lack of emotional connection and "heart and spirit" compared to human interaction.

title: OpenAI is now worth $500 billion, possibly making it the world’s most valuable startup
description: Current and former OpenAI employees sold $6.6 billion in shares to a group of investors, pushing the privately held artificial intelligence company’s valuation to $500 billion, according to a source with knowledge of the deal.
content:
OpenAI could now be the world’s most valuable startup, ahead of Elon Musk’s SpaceX and TikTok’s parent company ByteDance, after a secondary stock sale designed to retain employees at the ChatGPT maker.

title: Wall Street ticks to more records, led by technology stocks
description: Technology stocks helped lead the way after OpenAI announced partnerships with South Korean companies for its Stargate artificial-intelligence infrastructure project.
content:
